name: undecomposed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not decayed: They were expected to make their robes from discarded cloth, but they were not to take cloth from undecomposed bodies. an undecomposed corpse
chemistry
  specialized not broken into smaller parts: Here and there we found pieces of undecomposed limestone.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is said to be where St Cuthbert's remains were discovered - undecomposed - in 698.Fish meal is the clean, dried, ground tissue of undecomposed whole fish or fish cuttings.Never dig in undecomposed organic matter while the potatoes are growing.It is possible that dredging will expose undecomposed peat, which has an oxygen demand.All samples were collected after removal of undecomposed leaves and other organic matter from the surface.
